Technology
Technology
RITe™ Platform >

Our breakthrough, proprietary technology platform engineered to enhance drug absorption through our easy-to-take orally disintegrating tablet

Manufacturing >

Supporting our R&D is our end-to-end control of formulating, developing and manufacturing our proprietary products in-house at our state-of-the-art facility in the USA

Intellectual Property >

Strong domestic and international intellectual property and trade secret portfolio

Research
Research
ORAVEXX™ Research + Development >

Our proprietary cannabidiol composition that utilizes the RITe™ Platform to treat moderate to severe pain

Research Partners >

Partnering with the world’s leading research institutions and doctors to support multiple FDA-authorized investigator-initiated clinical trials

Pipeline >

Investigator-initiated trials utilizing Orcosa’s proprietary formulation

Frequently Asked Questions >
